We would like to thank you for your participation at IBAS – International Brazil Air Show.
To Expose Merchandising IBAS – International Brazil Air Show – offers special prices and different options of participation, which will meet the needs of each company.
The seminar will take place on March 29th 2017, in the afternoon, right after IBAS – International Brazil Air Show opening ceremony.
